EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for joining our Town Hall and celebration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thanks for joining the Pivotal Town Hall on Tuesday, and celebrating what has been an extraordinary first year for Pivotal. Every day we become more than the sum of our parts, with all the right ingredients – people, products, and passion – to lead an industry into the next-generation of cloud computing.
If you couldn’t attend, visit Inside Pivotal to watch the replay <https://sites.google.com/a/gopivotal.com/inside-pivotal/employee-information/pivotal-town-hall>. Also, please take a few minutes to fill out a Pivotal Town Hall survey here. <https://docs.google.com/a/gopivotal.com/forms/d/1_2ghll628OVBpw-wnQzqBBGN7H6OfTkr1sB1bbCCfyU/viewform?usp=send_form> Finally, for the product planning and update videos that Hugh Williams referenced, head to the Pivotal R&D Site <https://sites.google.com/a/gopivotal.com/r-d/q1-14-planning>.
Thank you all again for being part of the effort to make this happen!
Best, Richard
